comment.body:
I can't readily find that ad (or similar ones with "annonse" branding) on the site, and I can't find anything relevant in the F12 Elements tree either. So something isn't adding up.

Note to Team AdGuard: The ad is supposed to be for a paid-service podcast (It's not erotica), though I can see that it'd be at least somewhat posing. `https://podme.com/no/gi-meg-alle-detaljene` indicate the focus is on 00's pop culture and gossip.

issue.title: www.deezer.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.deezer.com/nl/artist/71236522](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.deezer.com%2Fnl%2Fartist%2F71236522) ### Comment > Just like in the windows app, I cannot play music on Deezer with DNS filtering enabled.
